species.name: houndoom
descriptions: Identifiable by its eerie howls, people a long time ago thought it was the grim reaper and feared it.
If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its mouth, the pain will never go away.
In a HOUNDOOM pack, the one with its horns raked sharply back serves a leadership role. They choose their leader by fighting among themselves.
Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be the call of the grim reaper.
The flames it breathes when angry contain toxins. If they cause a burn, it will hurt forever.

abilities.name: early-bird
abilities.effect: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

abilities.name: flash-fire
abilities.effect: Protects against fire moves.  Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

abilities.name: unnerve
abilities.effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.
